When Baal is stunned or silenced whilst in the Otherworld, he is kicked out of it immediately.
tooltips.Note0: Disjoints projectiles.

tooltips.name: Exit Otherworld
tooltips.description: Baal immediately leaves the Otherworld.

tooltips.name: Port Out
tooltips.description: Jumps to the Rift immediately.

tooltips.name: Spatial Rift
tooltips.description: After a 1 second channel time, creates a rift at the target location that deals damage and slows drastically.

tooltips.name: Spatiotemporal Anchor
tooltips.description: Anchors the target enemy to a location.  When they move too far away from the location, they are stunned, take damage, and are teleported to it.

tooltips.name: Superposition
tooltips.description: Baal creates an area where he is able to instantly occupy any location within it, then teleports.  Enemies within the area are slowed.  Increases his attack speed and attack range whilst within the area.  Issuing move orders within the radius will instantly transport him to that location instead of making him walk there.

tooltips.name: Superposition
tooltips.description: Baal enters a state of instability for a short time, becoming untargetable, invisible, unrevealable and immune to Physical damage.
tooltips.Note0: Disjoints projectiles upon use.

tooltips.name: Vector Plate
tooltips.description: Summons a plate facing away from Baal.  Enemies and allies that step on the plate will be rooted and pushed in the direction the arrow is facing.  Enemies take damage and are slowed by this.  When cast, a sub ability allows you to change the direction the arrow is facing with a second cast.
tooltips.change_description: Changes the direction of the last Vector Plate you created to face the cursor position.
tooltips.switch_description: Prevents Baal from being affected by his own Vector Plates when toggled on.

tooltips.name: Change Direction
tooltips.description: Changes the direction of the last Vector Plate you created to face the cursor position.

tooltips.name: Vector Plate Immunity
tooltips.description: Prevents Baal from being affected by his own Vector Plates when toggled on.

tooltips.name: Desolation
tooltips.description: Forces elemental energies into the target enemy, dealing Magical damage and surrounding them with a burning aura that deals damage over time to nearby enemies. The main target has any Fulmination stacks it possesses detonated.

tooltips.name: Fulmination
tooltips.description: Each attack that Bahamut makes against his enemies begins to pull apart the strands of reality, reweaving them into explosive energies.  A short time after he stops attacking them, these energies detonate, dealing large damage based on the amount of stacks accumulated. The final detonation damage is equivalent to the number of stacks multiplied by the base damage, and is increased by a percentage per stack.
tooltips.Note0: The bonus damage is linear. 8 stacks grants a 100% damage bonus.

tooltips.name: Mega Flare
tooltips.description: Summons an orb of pure power that slowly travels towards the targeted point, detonating when it reaches it to deal massive Pure damage.  Enemies closer to the center of the explosion take more damage.  Has a minimum cast range.
tooltips.Note0: The minimum cast range is 475.  Targeting a point below this range will force the targeted point to be 475 units away from the caster, in the direction they cast it.

tooltips.name: Reckoning Aura
tooltips.description: Bahamut's very presence causes nearby enemies to take more damage. Can be targeted on an enemy to double the effect for them alone.

tooltips.name: Doomflame
tooltips.Description: With a howl, the Wolf summons a wave of fire that washes over the battlefield, leaving damaging ground in its wake. Balthasar may traverse this ground at extremely high speed, catching enemies that normally would escape him.

tooltips.name: Emerald Fang
tooltips.Description: Striking his enemies with a deadly fang, Balthasar deals Magical damage over time to enemies based on his attack damage. Ticks every 0.5s.

tooltips.name: Firebolt
tooltips.Description: Balthasar unleashes a blast of jade fire at his target, dealing damage and then damage over time.

tooltips.name: Ward Of The Emerald Flame
tooltips.Description: Summons the Ward of the Emerald Flame to guard an area, granting Flying vision, dealing damage over time, and slowing enemies by a small amount. Any invisible unit that wanders under the Ward is revealed and receives the full slow amount.

tooltips.name: Blood Madness
tooltips.Description: The Bloodwarrior consumes a portion of his own vitality to convert it into pure, unbridled rage, granting him incredible fighting prowess for a short time. He gains bonus movespeed, attackspeed, damage, and Lifesteal. Killing an enemy Hero under Blood Madness' effects will grant him bonus Lifesteal and add a bonus to the duration of the ability.

tooltips.name: Blood Rain
tooltips.Description: Global cast range. Bloodwarrior creates an area where blood rains from the skies, drenching enemies in sanguine fluid. The area damages enemies, and continuously applies a debuff that slows them and causes attacks to Lifesteal against them.

tooltips.name: Red Curse
tooltips.Description: Bloodwarrior transfers his blood curse to the target enemy for a long duration. Steals Strength, slows, and reduces attack damage. The debuff gradually increases to its maximum strength, reaching 100%% of its reductions at half its duration. Killing a creep immediately dispels the debuff.

tooltips.name: Soul Claw
tooltips.Description: Occasionally, Bloodwarrior's strikes are imbued with his whorling vital energies, dealing bonus Magical damage, ministunning and preventing the target from regenerating Health for a short time. The bonus damage is based off his current Health.

tooltips.name: Continuum Crystal
tooltips.description: Envelops the target unit in temporally suspended crystals, rendering them invulnerable and disabled for the duration, while recovering a percentage of their health and mana.  Volatile temporal energy leaks from the crystal, dealing damage and slowing in an AoE around them.

tooltips.name: Future Sight
tooltips.description: Chronos casts a spell that allows him and his allies to see into the future, giving them a chance to completely avoid damage sources.

tooltips.name: Synchronisation
tooltips.description: Beneath Chronos' feet lies the Timepiece, a powerful fundamental that dictates his form.  When it is red (tick), he gains bonus damage and attack speed.  When it is blue (tock), he gains bonus Armor, Magic Resistance and movespeed.  Each phase lasts 60s.  Casting this ability immediately switches over the phase.

tooltips.name: Warp
tooltips.description: Chronos teleports himself to the location targeted, dealing damage, and afflicting enemies with a powerful slow, on his departure and arrival points.  After a short while, he returns to the location he originally cast this ability from, dealing damage and slowing at both points once more.

tooltips.name: Ancient Pact
tooltips.description: Crimson calls upon the arts of his elders to trade his Mana for health, healing as much as possible, with great efficiency allowing the mana cost to be lower than the health healed.
tooltips.Lore: A wound repaired instantly.

tooltips.name: Disintegrate
tooltips.description: Crimson fires a beam of such incredible power that it melts through the defenses of its target, dealing current health percent based damage.  Reduces the target's Armor, Magic Resistance and Movespeed for a short time./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.Lore: An enemy annihilated once again.
tooltips.Note0: If the main target is not a Hero, and Aghanim's Scepter is purchased, it will not jump to nearby enemies.
tooltips.aghanim_description: The beam jumps to nearby units with a short delay.

tooltips.name: Destruction Sphere
tooltips.description: Summons a sphere that, after a short delay, explodes, dealing Magical damage based on the missing health of affected targets.
tooltips.Lore: A sphere of ruinous intent.

tooltips.name: Sacrifice
tooltips.description: Pulls a portion of the soul from a target enemy, dealing damage and slowing.  Enemies hit by the traveling Soul Shard will take damage and be slowed as well.
tooltips.Lore: A soul rent asunder.

tooltips.name: Electric Bolt
tooltips.description: Summons a bolt of electricity that deals damage over time to all targets within an AoE.  Passively increases Elementalist's attack speed.  Trinity increases Elementalist's attack speed based upon the level of this skill.

tooltips.name: Fire Bolt
tooltips.description: Shoots a bolt of flame at the target, dealing large damage to them.  Passively increases Elementalist's damage.  Trinity causes Elementalist's attacks to deal bonus Magical damage based upon the level of this skill.

tooltips.name: Ice Bolt
tooltips.description: Fires a bolt of ice at the target, damaging them and slowing their attack and move speed.  Passively causes Elementalist's attacks to slow enemies.  Trinity causes Elementalist's attacks to slow enemies more based upon the level of this skill.

tooltips.name: Trinity
tooltips.description: The Elementalist combines the powers of his spells, augmenting his attacks with them, but unable to cast them for the duration.  Each attack he makes is imbued with bonus magical damage based on the level of <font color='#ffcc56'>Fire Bolt</font>, a slow based on the level of <font color='#6699ff'>Ice Bolt</font>, and attack speed and damage over time based on the level of <font color='#66ffcc'>Electric Bolt</font>.  Lasts 15 seconds./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.aghanim_description: Increases Strength, Agility and Intellect based on the level of Elementalist's Ultimate while it is active, and removes the casting restrictions.

tooltips.name: Bladebreaker
tooltips.Description: Elena enchants nearby opponent's weaponry with a powerful hex, causing them to take Pure damage equivalent to a base amount plus a portion of their attack damage, and become disarmed for a short time.

tooltips.name: Convoke
tooltips.description: Creates an area of effect that prevents health recovery and deals damage over time to enemies within it, stealing their Health and granting it to Elena herself. Has a 1s formation delay.
tooltips.2_description: Deals damage to an enemy/heals an ally based upon Elena's Convoke stack total.
tooltips.2_damage_per_convoke_stack: DAMAGE OR HEAL PER CONVOKE STACK:

tooltips.name: Infuse
tooltips.description: Deals damage to an enemy/heals an ally based upon Elena's Convoke stack total.
tooltips.damage_per_convoke_stack: DAMAGE OR HEAL PER CONVOKE STACK:

tooltips.name: Devotion Aura
tooltips.description: Grants bonus regeneration to nearby allies whenever Elena casts a Spell.
tooltips.Lore: The protective aura of an Infuser grows stronger as their devotion to their subjects improves.

tooltips.name: Diverge
tooltips.description: Elena channels for up to 12s, reducing damage to her allies in a 1000 radius.  As damage is dealt to her allies, the area fills with unbearable malevolent energies, dealing damage over time to all enemies within the radius based on the total damage accumulated.  If she would die during the effect, it deals 40% of the total damage pool to enemies.
tooltips.Lore: Under the glowing enchantments of a skilled Infuser, the bloodlust of their enemies can be turned against them.
tooltips.Note0: Ignores the reduction when calculating total damage.
tooltips.new_description: Elena creates an area that lasts for 16s, and deals damage over time. When damage is dealt to allies within the area, the damage over time grows in strength.
tooltips.new_Lore: Under the glowing enchantments of a skilled Infuser, the bloodlust of their enemies can be turned against them.
tooltips.new_Note0: Ignores the reduction when calculating total damage.

tooltips.name: Diverge
tooltips.description: Elena creates an area that lasts for 16s, and deals damage over time. When damage is dealt to allies within the area, the damage over time grows in strength.
tooltips.Lore: Under the glowing enchantments of a skilled Infuser, the bloodlust of their enemies can be turned against them.
tooltips.Note0: Ignores the reduction when calculating total damage.

tooltips.name: Malefic Inversion
tooltips.Description: Elena weaves a bubble of protective energy around the target ally, disabling them. The bubble converts damage taken to healing instead.

tooltips.name: Meditation
tooltips.description: Elena channels, focusing on the target enemy. Her mental powers root them in place for a short time, then slow them for the rest of the channel duration. Grants vision of the unit.
tooltips.Lore: Infusers are able to stay their enemy's hand through simple force of will.

tooltips.name: Starlight
tooltips.Description: After a short charge time, Elena fires a blast of energy in a line, damaging enemies and healing allies. The damage and heal increases for each enemy and ally Hero caught in it. The heal is only a portion of the damage.

tooltips.name: Deathtouch
tooltips.Description: With but a touch, Erra rends the target's soul asunder, dealing massive damage over time.

tooltips.name: Grave Guard
tooltips.Description: When Erra drops below certain threshold of Health, he gains bonus Health and Mana regeneration for a short time to combat it.

tooltips.name: Morbid Blade
tooltips.Description: Summons forth the winds of the Black Tide to slice through all enemies caught in them. Deals Physical damage, but if any enemy is below a Health threshold, it deals Pure damage, and its cooldown is halved. A portion of the target's missing Health is granted as healing to Erra.

tooltips.name: To Dust
tooltips.Description: Revelling in the pain of his enemies, Erra drinks in their dwindling lifeforce, converting the entropy to damage. Grants bonus attack damage based on the amount of missing Health of all the enemies in the radius given.

tooltips.name: Detonation
tooltips.description: Detonator channels a charge and releases an explosion around the caster if the channel is successful, dealing damage and knocking back all enemies in range of the explosion

tooltips.name: Ancestral Recall
tooltips.description: Fate channels, targeting an ally. When the channel completes, he grants them access to greater knowledge of their past and future. Grants them bonus stats as if they were a number of levels higher than they currently are, and restores their Health and Mana by a percentage.

tooltips.name: Chains Of Fate
tooltips.description: Fate binds the targeted unit with the chains of fate. Any unit bound to the chains will receive a portion of the damage units in the radius receive.

tooltips.name: Displace
tooltips.description: Displaces the target ally's destiny temporarily, making them untargetable, attack immune, not appear on the minimap, and move through units. Disjoints projectiles and purges debuffs upon cast.

tooltips.name: Doomsayer
tooltips.description: Fate places a deathly curse on the target area. After a delay, the area implodes, dealing damage based on the Max Health of all affected Heroes inside it. Displaced units have the buff purged immediately off them./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.aghanim_description: Reduces the Max Health of the affected targets by 15%% for 5s.

tooltips.name: Realign
tooltips.description: Realigns allies and enemies in a small AoE, dealing damage to enemies and healing allies.  Immediately ends Displace's first effect.

tooltips.name: Berserk
tooltips.description: With a frenzied roar, Fury lives up to his name, entering a state of frenzy, doubling the efficacy of all of his abilities. Increases his attack speed, causes Rend and Bloodsport to apply an additional stack, and doubles the damage, slow and bonuses if Roar is used while active.

tooltips.name: Bloodsport
tooltips.description: The Deathbeast has such insatiable bloodlust that strikes against his opponents have an almost supernatural tendency to make them bleed.  Damages over time for each stack on the target.  Stacks last for 6s, and ignore damage block.

Tooltips.Description: Fury tears away the target's defenses as he strikes, increasing the Physical damage they take by %damage_amp%%%.

modifier_fury_damage_amp.name: Rend Damage Amplification
modifier_fury_damage_amp.description: Taking more damage when being struck by attacks.

modifier_fury_damage_amp.name: Rend Damage Amplification
modifier_fury_damage_amp.description: Taking more damage when being struck by attacks.

tooltips.name: Rend
tooltips.description: With each strike, Fury rends his target's flesh, reducing their maximum Health.

tooltips.name: Roar
tooltips.Description: Fury unleashes a roar that leaves his enemies shaken and fearing for their lives. The sonic blast reduces their movespeed, damages them, and empowers Fury for each unit hit, granting him bonus attack speed, movespeed, and damage.

tooltips.name: Terashock
tooltips.description: Fury slams the ground, dealing large damage and slowing nearby enemies. Empowers him for each unit hit, granting bonus attack speed.

tooltips.name: Abyssal Shadow
tooltips.Description:
The Voidwalker summons a powerful being from another plane to help him fight. The creature floats behind him at all times and attacks anything nearby. Each level in this ability increases the creature's damage.
The creature's attacks deal bonus Magical damage that increases with each strike. It is invulnerable and untargetable.

tooltips.name: Abyssal Vortex
tooltips.description: The Voidwalker unleashes his most powerful and dangerous spell, creating a gigantic vortex of whorling energy after a 1s delay.  The vortex drags in and damages all non-Magic Immune units, with the amount of damage dealt scaling as they get closer to the centre./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.aghanim_description: Stuns enemy units that reach the centre.

tooltips.name: Extraplanar Pact
tooltips.Description: Drags the target ally into another plane to make a pact with an extraplanar being, causing them to become invulnerable for a short time. Upon entering the pact, they recover a percentage of their maximum Health and Mana.

tooltips.name: Planar Trickery
tooltips.description: Summons a portal beneath the target allied or enemy Hero's feet. At any time, he may recast this Spell to instantly transport to the portal's location, consuming it. If the Voidwalker dies, the portal disappears.
tooltips.activate_description: Teleports Voidwalker to a placed Planar Trickery portal on the map.

tooltips.name: Jump to Planar Trickery Portal
tooltips.description: Teleports Voidwalker to a placed Planar Trickery portal on the map.

tooltips.name: Realm Blister
tooltips.description: Creates an area where reality has folded in upon itself, separating those inside from those outside. Units inside the hemisphere cannot damage or be damaged by outside targets.

tooltips.name: Unstable Rift
tooltips.description: Creates a portal at the Voidwalker's feet and another location on the map.  Any Hero, ally or enemy, that lingers on it for the delay time is instantly transported to the linked portal across the map. Those transported suffer 15%% of their maximum health as Magical damage. Silenced Heroes cannot use the portal, but will still count the delay time. The portal will only transport one unit at a time.

tooltips.name: Voidal Flare
tooltips.description: The Voidwalker fires a flare of dark energy at the target, dealing Magical damage and stunning them. The damage and duration increase by a flat amount each time it is used on the same target, up to a maximum amount of times.

tooltips.name: Clearance Sale
tooltips.Description: The Gob Squad offloads all of their excess explosives, throwing a bomb out of their cart every half second. Bombs deal Magical damage, Physical damage and slow, or Pure damage and stun, and land in a random location nearby. The Gob Squad takes half damage from the bombs./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.aghanim_Description: Reduces interval between bombs, releases a giant bomb upon duration end or death.

tooltips.name: Kamikaze
tooltips.Description: Charges for 4s, gaining bonus movespeed. When the duration ends, or the Gob Squad dies, they explode, losing a portion of their Health (based off their maximum Health), and dealing Magical base damage plus bonus damage based on the amount of Health they lost. They are stunned for 1s after use.

tooltips.name: Rocket Blast
tooltips.Description: Fires a rocket at the target location. Upon colliding with any enemy units or buildings, the rocket will explode, dealing Magical damage in an AoE. Explodes when colliding with buildings, but deals no damage to them.

tooltips.name: Whoops
tooltips.Description: When Gob Squad dies, they immediately explode, dealing heavy Magical damage in a large area around them and stunning affected enemies for a short time.

tooltips.name: Detonator Dart
tooltips.description: Hawkeye pins an enemy with one of his powerful explosive devices.  After a short delay, the unit explodes, dealing large damage in a significant area.
tooltips.Note0: If the unit dies, the explosion occurs regardless of the countdown.
tooltips.Note1: Detonator Dart debuffs stack fully, unless the debuffs are being applied through Hawkeye's Talent, in which case it will not apply another debuff if one already exists on the unit.

tooltips.name: Single Tap
tooltips.description: After 1 second of charging, Hawkeye fires a projectile that travels a great distance, dealing base damage and damage based on a multiplier of his attack damage while piercing through enemies.  The first Hero enemy hit that isn't killed is marked for his second, more potent shot, which deals Pure damage.  After the shot collides with its targets, Hawkeye has a few moments to take the second shot./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.aghanim_description: Increases range, shot speed, reduces Single Tap damage, but increases the damage of Double Tap.
tooltips.second_shot_description: Hawkeye fires a second shot, this time at the first enemy unfortunate enough to be hit by the initial shot.  Deals base damage plus bonus damage based on a multiplier of his attack damage, but hits a single target instead./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

tooltips.name: Double Tap
tooltips.description: Hawkeye fires a second shot, this time at the first enemy unfortunate enough to be hit by the initial shot.  Deals base damage plus bonus damage based on a multiplier of his attack damage, but hits a single target instead./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

tooltips.name: Hit 'n' Run
tooltips.description: With a spring in his step, Hawkeye leaps out of harms way using the explosive soles on his boots.  Leaves behind an area of damaging and slowing shrapnel to deter his more eager foes.
tooltips.Note0: Does not interrupt channelled abilities.

tooltips.name: Rapidfire
tooltips.description: Fires multiple shots in succession at the target unit.  This ability preserves UAMs, attack effects, procs, and crits. Reduces the damage by a percentage.
tooltips.Note0: Issues an attack order on the targeted unit.

tooltips.name: Snipe
tooltips.Description: Hawkeye focuses, gaining true strike, bonus attack range, bonus damage and vision of attacked targets for a number of attacks, but his movement slows to a crawl.
tooltips.Note0: The vision of attack targets lasts for 1.75s.

tooltips.name: Freedom Strike!
tooltips.description: For freedom!  Hero leaps into the air, and upon landing, deals damage and slows enemies in a short radius.

tooltips.name: Heroic Soul
tooltips.description: For courage! Hero unleashes a war cry that removes any negative effects he's experiencing and grants him bonus damage and move speed for a short time.  Can be cast while stunned.  The first 0.75s of the effect reduces the damage he takes by 60%%.

tooltips.name: Ultimate Saviour of the Downtrodden Hyper Justice Kick!
tooltips.description: For justice!  Hero kicks the target enemy, obliterating literally everything instantly.

tooltips.name: Justice Kick!
tooltips.description: For justice! Hero kicks the target enemy, knocking them back a short distance and slowing them.

tooltips.name: One Punch!
tooltips.description: Hero unleashes a devastating punch that deals critical damage, launching the enemy into the air. After a short delay time, they land, creating an explosion that deals Magical damage and stuns any affected units.
tooltips.aghanim_description: Increases crit and increases the Magical damage upon landing by a multiple of Hero's attack damage.

tooltips.name: Alone
tooltips.description: Shrouds an area near Horror to be shrouded in darkness, causing enemies to lose all vision for a short time. When Horror is unseen by the opposing team, passively grants him bonus movespeed, and allows him to exceed the movespeed cap. The effect lingers after entering vision for a short time. If his Ultimate is active, he gains the bonus regardless of whether he can be seen or not.
tooltips.Note0: Affects invulnerable units.

tooltips.name: Deathmark
tooltips.description: Applies a deathmark to a target enemy.  When Horror next attacks them, a slow and bonus damage will occur, and they will not be able to cast spells.  Grows in power the longer the deathmark remains on the target before being activated.

tooltips.name: Obscure
tooltips.Description: Creates a blast of darkness around Horror that deals damage, then applies a blind, reducing affected units' vision range to 0, and causing them to miss all of their attacks.

tooltips.name: Paranoia
tooltips.Description: The targeted enemy is cursed to take damage for each of their nearby allies over time. Creeps deal less damage than Heroes. Deals a base amount of half the Hero damage.

tooltips.name: Shadowclone
tooltips.description: Summons an illusion that deals large damage to enemies and moves faster than Horror himself.  Upon expiration, all damage dealt by the illusion is reverted.

tooltips.name: Sinister
tooltips.Description: Horror gains vision of the target enemy, bonus movespeed, and Flying movement. Every strike Horror makes against that enemy while this effect is active is a critical attack, and each time he strikes the critical damage increases.

tooltips.name: Terrify
tooltips.description: Using dark magic Horror instils a deep fear in the target enemy. For a short time, they are slowed slightly. If Horror draws near, they take damage, the slow becomes more powerful, and they can do nothing but run away.
tooltips.Note0: Horror's illusions do not cause terrified units to run away.

tooltips.name: Frostfall
tooltips.Description: The Ice Wyrm is surrounded by chilling air, slowly chipping away at her enemies' fortitude. Deals damage over time based on the affected units current HP.

tooltips.name: Glacial Impact
tooltips.Description: After a short delay, cold winds converge on the area, chilling it to freezing near instantly, and creating a large icy structure. Deals damage and stuns any affected units.

tooltips.name: Winters Breath
tooltips.Description: The Ice Wyrm's attacks are ensorced with icy power, dealing damage in an AoE and damage over time.

tooltips.name: Boulder Throw
tooltips.Description: Ironfist tosses the target enemy behind him. When they land, they are stunned and damaged.

tooltips.name: Change Stance
tooltips.Description: Change between different Stances./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.lore: The Lost One's training turns weakness to strength.

tooltips.name: Dragon Fist
tooltips.Description: Ironfist strikes the target with the fist of the Dragon, dealing massive Physical damage and stunning them.

tooltips.name: Dragon Stance
tooltips.Description: Focuses on dealing damage and fighting prowess. Can counter attacks, and strike with extreme damage.

tooltips.name: Focus
tooltips.Description: Ironfist focuses while he is not attacking or casting Spells, increasing the efficacy of his fighting abilities. Stacks of Focus grant different bonuses depending on the Stance he is in, and accumulate at a set rate. Casting a Spell will consume all stacks, whereas attacking will consume 1 stack, and prevent it from ticking up for a short time./nRegardless of what Stance he is in, casting a Spell will cause its cooldown to be reduced based on the amounts of Focus stacks he has./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.aghanim_Description: Increases the Focus stack maximum and reduces the interval.
tooltips.red_description: Places a focus on the target enemy, causing their weakpoint to be exposed.  Attacks targeting them will reduce their Strength and Armor.  If Ironfist hits a target with a red Focus, he will gain bonus damage for a short time./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.red_aghanim_description: This ability goes on cooldown only when all three focii are cast.
tooltips.green_description: Places a focus on the target enemy, causing their weakpoint to be exposed.  Attacks targeting them will reduce their Agility and movespeed.  If Ironfist hits a target with a green Focus, he will gain bonus attack speed for a short time./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.green_aghanim_description: This ability goes on cooldown only when all three focii are cast.
tooltips.blue_description: Places a focus on the target enemy, causing their weakpoint to be exposed.  Attacks targeting them will reduce their Intelligence and burn their mana.  If Ironfist hits a target with a blue Focus, he will gain the mana burned as well./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.blue_aghanim_description: This ability goes on cooldown only when all three focii are cast.

tooltips.name: Blue Focus
tooltips.description: Places a focus on the target enemy, causing their weakpoint to be exposed.  Attacks targeting them will reduce their Intelligence and burn their mana.  If Ironfist hits a target with a blue Focus, he will gain the mana burned as well./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.aghanim_description: This ability goes on cooldown only when all three focii are cast.

tooltips.name: Green Focus
tooltips.description: Places a focus on the target enemy, causing their weakpoint to be exposed.  Attacks targeting them will reduce their Agility and movespeed.  If Ironfist hits a target with a green Focus, he will gain bonus attack speed for a short time./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.aghanim_description: This ability goes on cooldown only when all three focii are cast.

tooltips.name: Red Focus
tooltips.description: Places a focus on the target enemy, causing their weakpoint to be exposed.  Attacks targeting them will reduce their Strength and Armor.  If Ironfist hits a target with a red Focus, he will gain bonus damage for a short time./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.aghanim_description: This ability goes on cooldown only when all three focii are cast.

tooltips.name: Gale Stance
tooltips.description: Focuses on avoiding attacks, and moving quickly around opponents. Can slow enemies with a dash attack, and attack extremely fast for a short time.

tooltips.name: Hissatsu
tooltips.description: The Monk goes invisible, moving with great speed, and damaging those around him.

tooltips.name: Lightning Strike
tooltips.Description: Ironfist strikes extremely fast for a number of attacks, reducing his BAT and increasing his attack speed.

tooltips.name: Quake
tooltips.description: Ironfist creates blasts of energy to fissure the ground beneath him, dealing damage multiple times.  Expands by the radius times the number of hits.  If 3 or more instances hit a target, they are stunned.

tooltips.name: Reversal
tooltips.description: With some concentration it's possible to turn your opponent's strikes against them. Deals damage based on the attack's damage and stuns the attacker. If timed perfectly, deals more damage and stuns for longer.

tooltips.name: Stonewall Stance
tooltips.description: Focuses on withstanding attacks, and controlling enemies. Can stun and deal Magical damage, and displace enemy positions.

tooltips.name: Typhoon
tooltips.description: Ironfist dashes forward, dealing damage and slowing those in his way.

tooltips.name: Absolute Zero
tooltips.description: The target enemy is afflicted with a terrible curse, having their movespeed, attack speed and cast time for Spells drastically slowed for a long duration and slowing their nearby allies' movespeed and attack speed within a radius.

tooltips.name: Deep Freeze
tooltips.description: The Lich's attacks ignite a chain reaction of freezing magic in their target, causing them to become ministunned and take Magical damage.
tooltips.Lore: Brrr.

tooltips.name: Traveling Frost
tooltips.description:
Fires a rolling wave of ice towards a target point. The first enemy it hits is damaged and frozen in place for a short time. Passes through and ignores units already affected by Traveling Frost.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.aghanim_description: Increases hit detection radius, and Traveling Frost creates multiple projectiles that travel in random directions when it hits a unit.
tooltips.Lore: It was ICE knowing you.

tooltips.name: Winter's Requiem
tooltips.description: All enemies within a large radius are marked. After a short delay, they are assailed by an icy explosion that deals damage and slows in an AoE.
tooltips.Note0: Each explosion deals damage separately. If all explosions hit a target this Spell's damage total is 160/360/640/1000. With the Talent, it's 340/630/1000/1450.
tooltips.Note1: This Spell cannot target a unit more than once.
tooltips.Lore: Are you feeling cold?

tooltips.name: Blinding Speed
tooltips.description: Lightning moves at extremely high speeds through obstacles for 6s, dealing a small amount of damage and slowing when she charges through her enemies.  She takes no damage while under the effects of this spell, but will be still be affected by buffs and debuffs.  If she stops moving for 1s, the effect will end prematurely.
tooltips.aghanim_description: Drastically increases speed and purges debuffs over the duration.

tooltips.name: Blinding Speed
tooltips.description: Cumulatively grants Lightning bonus movespeed and attack speed as she uses her abilities.  When she hits max stacks, her BAT is reduced.
tooltips.Lore: In tales, the Tijadi grow stronger and faster as the battle drags on.

tooltips.name: Boltblast
tooltips.Description: Lightning summons forth a payload of electrical energy that detonates after a short delay, dealing damage and slowing enemies in an AoE.

tooltips.name: Lightning Daggers
tooltips.description: Lightning throws a dagger at the target enemy, dealing a small amount of Magical damage and slowing. The dagger bounces to a random nearby target a number of times before stopping.
tooltips.Lore: The Tijadi have unending prowess with their throwing daggers, able to strike with pinpoint accuracy at the most elusive of foes.

tooltips.name: Lightning Daggers
tooltips.description: Lightning throws a dagger at the target enemy, dealing a small amount of Magical damage.
tooltips.Lore: The Tijadi have unending prowess with their throwing daggers, able to strike with pinpoint accuracy at the most elusive of foes.
tooltips.Note0: The initial slow is 100% and lasts for 0.75s.

tooltips.name: Overload
tooltips.description: Slows and damages enemies in an area around Lightning.
tooltips.Lore: Those who face the Tijadi in close combat rarely live long enough to see their full strength.

tooltips.name: Spark
tooltips.Description: Each time Lightning casts a spell, enemies in a large radius around her take Magical damage and are slowed by a small amount.
tooltips.Lore: A Tijadi's fury can set the very air of the battlefield crackling and ready to destroy their foes.

tooltips.name: Thunder Wave
tooltips.description: Creates a travelling cacophony of electrical blasts, slowing and damaging enemies hit by it.
tooltips.Lore: While their preference is to fight face-to-face, magic is not beyond them.

tooltips.name: Beneath The Mask
tooltips.Description: Lupin's next attack against a Hero deals bonus Physical damage, Silencing them and stealing their movespeed and attack speed.

tooltips.name: Finisher
tooltips.Description: Lupin fires a shot from his trusty pistol at the target, dealing Physical damage. If the target is Stunned or Dazed, deals bonus damage and Lupin makes an attack against them. Slows for a short time.

tooltips.name: Flashbang
tooltips.Description: In an area of effect, Lupin causes enemies to become Dazed by throwing a Flashbang. Dazed enemies are stunned, but the effect is removed if they take damage from any source.
tooltips.Note0: Enemies stay Dazed for a minimum of 0.5s.
tooltips.Note1: The damage source needs to exceed 20 to purge the Daze.

tooltips.name: Last Surprise
tooltips.Description: Lupin quickly strikes all enemy units in a line with an attack, then does the same in the opposite direction, arriving at his starting location. Creeps take less damage from this skill.

tooltips.name: Adventurous Gale
tooltips.description: Lysander whips up a mystical wind that creates a wave, carrying him and enemy units caught in it forward a great distance. Leaves behind an area that slows enemies and speeds up allies.

tooltips.name: Captains Compass
tooltips.description: Targets a unit with Lysander's Magical Compass, granting vision and truesight of them. Lysander gains bonus movespeed and attack speed based on how close he is to the unit.

tooltips.name: Grapeshot
tooltips.description: Lysander fires his handgun at a target unit or building, dealing Physical damage based on his attack strength.  When shooting at short range, it ministuns the target.  Has a chance to crit, which halves the ability's cooldown, refunds the Mana cost, increases the damage, and ministuns regardless of how far away the target is./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.aghanim_description: Lysander has a chance to Grapeshot a nearby enemy when he attacks. These shots can Crit as normal, but never stun.

tooltips.name: Phantom Dreadnaught
tooltips.description: Summons forth an ethereal ship that fires its chase cannons ahead, dealing damage to enemy units and buildings. Deals quarter damage to buildings.
tooltips.aghanim_description: Gives Lysander a guaranteed Grapeshot crit every 14s, doubles the stun duration, and autocasts Grapeshot on targets affected by Captain's Compass, if they are in range, but removes the crit chance completely.

tooltips.name: Arcanum Break
tooltips.Description: The Mindflayer's attacks have a chance to strike at the soul of his targets, shattering their Magical energies. Removes Mana from the target, and deals bonus Magical damage, alongside reducing all outgoing spell damage for a short time.

tooltips.name: Infusion Bolt
tooltips.Description: Mindflayer fires a bolt at the target that stuns them, and deals damage based on their missing Mana.

tooltips.name: Mana Seal
tooltips.Description: The Mindflayer creates a glyph that seals away Magical energies, gradually draining the Mana of enemies that stand upon it. If their Mana hits 0, they are mini-stunned, damaged and slowed for 1.5s. Ignores targets affected by the 0 Mana mini-stun for a short time afterwards.
tooltips.aghanim_Description: Upgrades Mana Seal to pierce Magic Immunity, increases the mana drain per second, reduces the ignore time to 4s, and makes the damage upon reaching zero Mana Pure.

tooltips.name: Vorpal Assault
tooltips.Description: The Mindflayer unleashes a flurry of anti-Magic energy at the target, dealing damage, burning Mana, and cumulatively Silencing them. Each bolt applies its effects separately, and is not a projectile; it hits instantly. There is a short delay between the bolts.

tooltips.name: Bushido
tooltips.Description: Mifune's intense training and discipline allows him to extract more benefits from his Agility. Upon activation, grants a percentage of his Base Agility as bonus Agility, and grants him bonus damage based upon his base damage for a short time.
tooltips.aghanim_Description: Bushido grants %scepter_evasion%%% evasion. When an enemy misses an attack against Mifune in this form, he instantly counterattacks.

tooltips.name: Genso
tooltips.description: Creates an illusion to attack the targeted enemy.  The illusions can be killed and move slightly faster than Mifune himself, but cannot be controlled.
tooltips.Note0: Illusions have a 15% movespeed bonus.

tooltips.name: Oiuchi
tooltips.description: Mifune strikes deathblows against low health enemies, dealing bonus damage based upon his Agility.
tooltips.Note0: Illusions created using Genso gain this ability, but deal 25% total damage with it.

tooltips.name: Raigeki
tooltips.description: Slashes to create a burst of energy that travels at speed towards the target point.  After a delay, a second shockwave explodes across the battlefield, dealing the same damage.  Both attacks slow the enemy.

tooltips.name: Zanmato
tooltips.description: Mifune focuses for a moment, then unleashes the most powerful ability in his arsenal; he slashes at blinding speed, attacking all enemies in the radius of the spell.  After this ends, the energy created from his attacks converges on the main target, dealing Magical damage for each enemy within the radius.  The main target is stunned while Mifune is slashing.  Deals bonus damage to Heroes./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.Note0: The main target is stunned for a minimum of 1s.
tooltips.Note1: The slash preserves procs and orb effects.
tooltips.Note2: The Orbs deal Magical damage, and converge on the main target when the initial slashes end.
tooltips.scepter_description: Mifune focuses for a moment, then unleashes the most powerful ability in his arsenal; he slashes at blinding speed, attacking all enemies in the radius of the spell.  After this ends, the energy created from his attacks converges on the main target, dealing Magical damage for each enemy within the radius.  The main target is stunned while Mifune is slashing.  Deals bonus damage to Heroes.
tooltips.scepter_aghanim_description: Increases cast range, damage, radius and reduces cooldown.
tooltips.scepter_Note0: The main target is stunned for a minimum of 1s.
tooltips.scepter_Note1: The slash preserves procs and orb effects.
tooltips.scepter_Note2: The Orbs deal Magical damage, and converge on the main target when the initial slashes end.

tooltips.name: Zanmato
tooltips.description: Mifune focuses for a moment, then unleashes the most powerful ability in his arsenal; he slashes at blinding speed, attacking all enemies in the radius of the spell.  After this ends, the energy created from his attacks converges on the main target, dealing Magical damage for each enemy within the radius.  The main target is stunned while Mifune is slashing.  Deals bonus damage to Heroes.
tooltips.aghanim_description: Increases cast range, damage, radius and reduces cooldown.
tooltips.Note0: The main target is stunned for a minimum of 1s.
tooltips.Note1: The slash preserves procs and orb effects.
tooltips.Note2: The Orbs deal Magical damage, and converge on the main target when the initial slashes end.

tooltips.name: Decisive Strike
tooltips.description: Neith strikes a devastating blow with bloodlust alone against a random nearby enemy, dealing large Magical damage, slowing their attack speed and movespeed, and stealing some of their Armor for a short duration.

tooltips.name: Inspire
tooltips.description: The Warrior Goddess' actions inspire her comrades, increasing their attack damage for a short time when she uses her abilities near them. Grants less damage to creeps.

tooltips.name: Monsoon
tooltips.description: Neith unleashes an attack that cripples nearby enemies and empowers her, dealing damage in an AoE and stealing attack damage, alongside reducing their Armor.

tooltips.name: Rally
tooltips.description: With a war cry, Neith rallies her nearby allies to battle, increasing their attack damage, move speed and attack speed for a very short time. Creeps gain less attack damage, but the same amount of move speed and attack speed./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.aghanim_description: Increases radius and duration, and reduces nearby enemies' attackspeed, movespeed and damage by the same amount as it increases for your allies.

tooltips.name: Flux Field
tooltips.Description: Nu gathers the fluctuating energies of the cosmos into one spot, creating an area that deals damage over time. Whenever an enemy casts a Spell or uses an item that costs Mana whilst inside the area, all enemy units in the radius are damaged and ministunned.

tooltips.name: Gravity Pulse
tooltips.Description: Nu creates a devastating gravitational pulse at the target area, dealing large Physical damage and slowing drastically any enemies caught in it.

tooltips.name: Micronebula
tooltips.Description: Nu summons a Micronebula that latches onto the target unit. At the end of its duration, a percentage of damage the unit took is dealt over 3s to units in a 325 radius before dissipating. Reduces Armor. If the target would die, half the damage they would have taken at the end of the duration is instead dealt instantly to all units in the radius.

tooltips.name: Warpstar
tooltips.Description: A devastating cosmological entity, the Warpstar, after a short delay, deals Pure damage and transports allies and enemies alike to the position where Nu cast the spell. During the delay, enemies caught in the vortex are slowed.
tooltips.Note0: Allies do not take damage from this ability.
tooltips.Note1: Transport targets are locked 0.4s before the ability completes. Even if those locked targets leave the immediate area, they will be transported.

tooltips.name: The Eye of Truth
tooltips.description: Odin leers over a target area, granting vision and slowing, and damaging, silencing, rooting and muting invisible units.  Instantly kills illusions that wander into the radius.

tooltips.name: Gungnir
tooltips.description: Odin throws his spear at a target location globally.  After a 2s delay, the spear lands with destructive impact, dealing large Magical damage to all those unfortunate enough to be caught in the blast, and stunning them.  For a short while afterwards, Odin's attacks are far weaker and shorter range, until his spear returns to his person./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.aghanim_description: Increases damage and removes attack range and damage debuff.

tooltips.name: Oppression
tooltips.description: With each of their strikes against Odin, his opponents despair, losing attack damage and attack speed.

tooltips.name: Sleipnir's Veil
tooltips.description: Sleipnir whinnies and drags itself and its master into a veiled plane, rendering them invisible to enemies and granting them bonus movespeed.  Enemies that are passed through take damage and are slowed.  Can pass through enemies multiple times.

tooltips.name: Diffusion
tooltips.description: As Ouroboros takes Magical damage, his scales diffuse its energies, converting it to life force. Increases Magic Resistance and Health and Mana regen based on the damage Ouroboros takes.
tooltips.Note0: Damage below or between the threshold of 100 still increases Magic Resistance, Health regen and Mana regen, but does not show as a buff stack.

tooltips.name: Dragon's Wing
tooltips.description: Ouroboros takes flight, knocking back and slowing nearby enemies, gaining bonus movespeed and free pathing.  Lasts 7.5s.

tooltips.name: Dualcast
tooltips.description: Ouroboros takes advantage of his extra appendage and spellcasting prowess combined, casting Spells twice in quick succession, provided he has the mana to do so. Consumes a multiplier of the original Mana cost of the Spell for the second cast.

tooltips.name: Nexus
tooltips.description: Summons a devastating concentrated blast of flame from the sky after a short delay, dealing massive damage to enemies caught in the AoE.  Stuns for a short time.

tooltips.name: Searing Flame
tooltips.description: Ouroboros unleashes an incredible whorl of superheated gases from his vesicles, dealing damage to, and crippling for a very short time, enemies caught in the cone.
tooltips.aghanim_description: Increases slow and applies a stacking damage over time effect to targets hit.
tooltips.Note0: Travels past the max cast range by 125 units.

tooltips.name: Cleanse
tooltips.description: Heals an ally or deals damage to an enemy.  Additionally heals allies in a radius around them for a smaller amount.
tooltips.Note0: Secondary Heal does not affect the primary target.
tooltips.Lore: The Paragon must learn to cleanse both his allies and his enemies of their worldly anchors.

tooltips.name: Divine Armour
tooltips.Description: After reaching a threshold of damage, Paragon's Armour unleashes a blast of light, damaging nearby enemies based on their Maximum Health, and causing him to take less damage for a short time afterwards. Disabled by Break.

tooltips.name: Guardian
tooltips.description: The Paragon protects his nearby allies from harm for 5s, taking damage in their stead.  The damage is reduced.  Does not activate if Paragon himself is affected by Tranquility Seal.
tooltips.Lore: Protection and sacrifice are synonymous for the Paragon.

tooltips.name: Smite
tooltips.description: The Paragon calls forth a divine bolt to strike the targeted enemy. Global./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.aghanim_description: Damage increase. Adds bonus damage if the target was the last person to kill a member of your team.
tooltips.Lore: While the Paragon is pure in soul, retribution leaves a sweet taste on the tongue.

tooltips.name: Tranquility Seal
tooltips.description: The target is sealed, preventing them from dealing or receiving damage for the duration./nCan be cast on Buildings.
tooltips.Lore: Sometimes the simplest of seals are the most effective.

tooltips.name: Deathstrike
tooltips.description: The Phantasm's strikes are much more effective against targets close to death, dealing bonus Physical damage based upon their missing Health when below a threshold.
tooltips.Lore: Her banishment from the material plane had some unintended side effects; such as the ability to strike directly at the soul of her targets.

tooltips.name: Nightmare
tooltips.description: The Phantasm inflicts a terrible nightmare upon the target enemy. The nightmare prevents them from targeting Phantasm with Spells, Items, or attacks, and prevents the target from being targeted by their allies' Spells and Items.

tooltips.name: Shadowstep
tooltips.description: Phantasm weaves herself into the shadows, appearing behind a target enemy after a delay and gaining bonus movespeed and evasion. If she is stunned or Silenced during the delay, the Spell does not complete. Global.
tooltips.Lore: As twisted a nightmare the Phantasm may be, she insists that it's nothin' personal, kid.

tooltips.name: Soul Wave
tooltips.description: Emits a shockwave from Phantasm that deals Magical damage. She regains a portion of the damage dealt to all units as Health, after reductions and amplifications.

tooltips.name: Astralise
tooltips.Description: The targeted unit has its soul removed from its body, dealing damage to enemies, and emitting pulses that heal allies and damage enemies. Deals damage based on a percentage of the target's Intelligence. Heals for half the amount.
tooltips.Note0: There is a 0.5s delay before pulses start.

tooltips.name: Enthrall
tooltips.Description: The targeted unit is afflicted with a powerful enchantment that lowers their Magic Resistance and converts all Physical damage taken to Magical damage before reductions. If the Physical damage would be negated absolutely (such as if the unit is Ethereal, or with Phantasm's Shadowstep), the effect does not function.

tooltips.name: Expunge
tooltips.Description: Drains a base amount plus a portion of current Mana out of the target unit, slowing them and creating an orb of energy above them. After a short delay, the orb explodes, dealing Magical damage equivalent to the amount drained, and restoring Mana to nearby allies equal to half of the amount drained. The damage cannot go below a minimum amount./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.aghanim_Description: Causes the spell to drain a percentage of the target's Max Mana as well as their Current Mana.

tooltips.name: Mirror Blade
tooltips.Description: Fires multiple blades of pure energy towards the target location, dealing Physical damage based upon Ptomely's Intelligence.

tooltips.name: Amplify
tooltips.Description: Rai forces his electrical energies into the air around him, causing it to damage nearby enemies over time. At the end of the duration, bolts of lightning zap multiple randomly selected nearby targets, slowing and damaging them.

tooltips.name: Arc Twister
tooltips.Description: Rai travels to a target location at extreme speed, arriving after a very short delay, and dealing damage to any enemies caught between his start and end point.

tooltips.name: Static Blade
tooltips.Description: As Rai deals Magical damage over a threshold to enemies, he gains Static Blade charges. When toggled on, deals bonus Magical damage, slows, and damages over time the enemy struck based on the amount of charges he has.

tooltips.name: Thunder Roar
tooltips.Description: After a short cast time, Rai creates an area of high energetic potential that follows him, striking a random nearby enemy with a bolt of lightning every few moments. The bolts mini-stun enemies and deal half damage in a large area around them.

tooltips.name: Ancient Arena
tooltips.description: Reus summons an arena of stone to trap his enemies.  Units on the inside cannot exit, and units on the outside cannot enter.  Whilst within the Arena, Reus gains bonus move speed, attack speed, damage and armor.
tooltips.Note0: For almost all cases, units that are spawned inside the arena are not removed from it.  This includes illusions, summoned units, temporary units, and heroes.
tooltips.Note1: Invulnerable units can exit and enter the arena, but will immediately come under its effects when they are no longer in their invulnerable state.  Units that were invulnerable when the ability started are not considered to be trapped in the arena.
tooltips.Note2: Has a maximum check range of 3000. If a unit goes beyond this range, they will not be pulled back into the arena.

tooltips.name: Gaia's Fury
tooltips.description: Reus charges his next attack with the power of the Earth. Upon striking a target, he deals bonus Physical damage based on his Strength stat, stuns them, and damages and slows all units in a large radius around them. Works on towers, but deals 0.25x damage, and stuns for half the duration.

tooltips.name: Magnitude
tooltips.description: Reus slams the ground to create an area that experiences deadly tremors, dealing damage and slowing enemies periodically.  Slows allies by 30%%.

tooltips.name: Stoneblast
tooltips.description: The Titan goes to toss a heavy slab of rock towards his target location, dealing physical damage and stunning enemies caught in it.

tooltips.name: Bloodcall
tooltips.description: The Sanguine Hunter unleashes a powerful spell, cutting his health in half, but granting regenerative power or dealing non-lethal damage over time to the targeted ally or enemy, respectively.  The strength of this ability is based on a percentage of the health consumed.

tooltips.name: Lifelink
tooltips.description: Links the lifeforce of the Hunter and another unit.  Whenever the unit deals damage, the Sanguine Hunter lifesteals a small percentage of it.  If the Sanguine Hunter receives damage, the affected unit gains life or takes damage based on the damage he took, depending on whether they're an ally or an enemy.

tooltips.name: Sadistic
tooltips.description: The Sanguine Hunter revels in battle and blood, gaining damage and movement speed for each enemy Hero nearby that is below a health threshold, and lifestealing off units below the threshold.  Non-Hero units grant half the lifesteal bonus.

tooltips.name: Soul Claw
tooltips.description: The Hunter sacrifices his health over time, augmenting his next attack with huge bonus damage.  The attack causes him to regain health based on a percentage of the target's health.  Consumes up to 50%% of his maximum health.
tooltips.Note0: The attack cannot miss.
tooltips.Note1: Non-Hero units grant half the health bonus.
tooltips.Note2: Buildings do not grant the health bonus.

tooltips.name: An Army Beneath The Sands
tooltips.description: Set channels, becoming invisible and creating a vortex of sand that slows and damages enemies, periodically summoning Sand Puppets to do his bidding.  The Sand Puppets will attack any enemies that are caught within, and will immediately die upon exiting the area or when the spell ends.  Sand Puppets generated through this ability are a multiplier of Set's level./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.aghanim_description: Lowers the interval, increases damage over time, increases slow, Sand Puppets can leave the area without dying.

tooltips.name: Harsh Climate
tooltips.description: The very presence of the Sand God turns the climate during the day from gentle to harsh, reducing enemies' attack speed and vision globally. Meanwhile Set is empowered by this harsh weather, gaining bonus movespeed and vision. Is less effective on creeps.
tooltips.Note0: Does not affect Ancients or Magic Immune enemies.

tooltips.name: Sands Of War
tooltips.description: Set kicks up two sand clouds that travel quickly and pass through each other.  Enemies hit by them are slowed. When they reach their destination, two Sand Puppets are spawned.  Sand Archers have large attack range that scales with level but low damage, and Sand Warriors have short attack range but high damage plus bonus movespeed that scales with level, and both last %time% seconds.  Sand Puppets are based upon Set's level, not the level of this skill.

tooltips.name: Archer
tooltips.description: This creature is a Sand Puppet of the Archer variety.  Has a large attack range and medium movement speed.  Its attack range increases as its level does.

tooltips.name: Warrior
tooltips.description: This creature is a Sand Puppet of the Warrior variety.  Has a small attack range and medium movement speed, but deals high damage, slows enemy movement speed and gains bonus movespeed passively.  The slow and movespeed bonus increases as its level does.

tooltips.name: Scarab Curse
tooltips.Description: Set places a curse on the target unit, summoning a Scarab to fly around them. The Scarab steals a portion of their attack damage, and then deals damage every %interval% second based on the amount stolen plus a base damage amount. Set can retarget the debuff to any other nearby unit within a %retarget_range% radius with his Switch Scarab Targets subability.

tooltips.name: Sirocco
tooltips.Description: Set unleashes a merciless sandstorm in the area around him. Enemies caught in it take %damage% damage per second, and have their vision reduced to %vision_change%, while Set and any Sand Puppets under his control recover Health equal to the damage amount. Lasts %duration% seconds. %radius% radius. Deals damage in 0.25s intervals. The vision reduction fully affects Buildings (but the damage does not).

tooltips.name: Switch Scarab Targets
tooltips.Description: Changes the Scarab's target.

tooltips.name: Dark Hunger
tooltips.lore: Shade feeds on his opponents' souls as they slip.
tooltips.description: Shade surrounds himself in dark energy, taking damage over time. While affected, he drains Health from nearby enemies, spreading the drain amount equally between all within the effective radius.

tooltips.name: Isolation
tooltips.description: The Nightwalker causes the target enemy to emit a shockwave, dealing a small amount of damage, and petrifying all of their nearby allies for a short time. The main target has their total damage output reduced and is blinded.

tooltips.name: Shadowshift
tooltips.description: Shade melds into the shadows, becoming Untargetable, moving %movespeed%%% faster and able to walk through units and terrain.

tooltips.name: Stalk
tooltips.lore: The venom that coats the blades of the Nightwalker can down giants with a single drop.
tooltips.description: The target enemy is slowed and granted vision of, while Shade becomes invisible and moves faster. When attacking the enemy, he deals bonus Physical damage and applies a debuff that slows and deals Physical damage over time.

tooltips.name: Venomous
tooltips.description: Shade applies a powerful Darkwyrm Venom that deals more damage the more debuffs the opponent is affected by. Deals %damage% damage per second per debuff.

tooltips.name: Cryst Whorl
tooltips.Description: The Shard Magus unleashes a blast of chilling magic at the target location. Enemies caught in it take a small amount of damage, and are afflicted with multiple phases of debuffs. Every few seconds, they take damage, and proceed to the next phase. The 1st is a grace period, the 2nd slows, and the 3rd stuns.

tooltips.name: Glacial Impact
tooltips.Description: The Shard Magus creates shards of ice that burst through the ground, stunning and damaging any enemies caught inside the radius.

tooltips.name: Iceheart
tooltips.Description: Whenever the Shard Magus casts a spell, her ensorced heart reacts, surging an icy shockwave forth. The shockwave deals damage, and slows movespeed, attackspeed and turnrate.

tooltips.name: Icicle Barrage
tooltips.Description:
With an incantation lost to time, the Shard Magus summons a turret-like structure before her. After a short delay, the turret begins peppering the area in front of it with myriad icicles. Each icicle deals damage and fully pierces the target.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

tooltips.name: Wyrm Rites
tooltips.Description: An ancient spell brings forth a Wyrm; a powerful and dangerous dragon from a time long past. The Wyrm has access to the spell Glacial Impact, and is surrounded by chilling winds. Its attack deal damage over time.

tooltips.name: Eon Shield
tooltips.Description: Siegfried tosses his ancient shield in the target direction, dealing %proj_damage% damage to enemies hit on the way. When it arrives, after a %delay% second delay, it deals %area_damage% and roots enemies in it for %root% seconds.

tooltips.name: Epoch's Protection
tooltips.Description: When Siegfried casts a Spell, Epoch grants him a shard of his protective energies, blessing him with Magic Immunity for a short time.

tooltips.name: Heaven Sent
tooltips.Description: Siegfried appears at the location of the target ally, rendering them invulnerable and untargetable, but unable to perform actions. After %duration% seconds, he returns to the location he cast the Spell from. Globally targetable./n/nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
tooltips.aghanim_Description: Drastically increases Siegfried and his ally's Health Regen for the duration.

tooltips.name: Hell Bent
tooltips.Description: Siegfried sacrifices %health_reduction%%% of his current Health to use the Demonfire forged into his soul and enter a frenzy, forcing himself to attack the target enemy for a short time. He gains bonus attack speed and bonus movespeed, alongside taking %damage_reduction%%% reduced Physical damage.

tooltips.name: Radiant Deals 225 Magical Damage
tooltips.Description: Deals the damage instantly in the effective radius.

tooltips.name: Radiant Heals Nearby Allies (50%)
tooltips.Description: Restores the same percentage as it does for Alexander, but halved, and in the effective range.

tooltips.name: Desolation AoE Applies Fulmination Stacks
tooltips.Description: Desolation's AoE ticks each apply 1 stack of Fulmination to all affected targets.

tooltips.name: +350 Ward of the Emerald Flame Range
1200 Radius Grave Guard Aura
tooltips.Description: When allies drop below the threshold, they gain the Grave Guard buff as if they possessed the skill. Has its own cooldown.

tooltips.name: Ride the Rocket Blast!
tooltips.Description: Gob Squad rides his rocket into battle.

tooltips.name: Mana Seal Silences For 3s
tooltips.Description: The Silence occurs when it's placed and is independent of the duration of the Mana Seal.

tooltips.name: Nexus is Pure and Pierces Spell Immunity
Nightmare 300 AoE
tooltips.Description: Nightmare affects all enemies in the AoE on cast.

tooltips.name: Half Magnitude Quake Interval
tooltips.Description: Magnitude hits twice as often.

tooltips.name: Glacial Impact Hits Buildings (2x Stun, 0.5x Damage)
tooltips.Description: Against non-building targets, it does the same amount of stun and damage.

tooltips.name: Epoch's Protection Basic Dispel
tooltips.Description: Applies on creating a new buff, not on refreshing an existing one.

tooltips.name: FIGHT ME! +40% Mana From Attacks
tooltips.Description: 40% of the healing you gain from enemy attacks during FIGHT ME!! is also restored as Mana.

tooltips.name: Clearance Sale
tooltips.Description: The Gob Squad offloads all of their excess explosives, throwing a bomb out of their cart every half second. Bombs deal Magical damage and land in a random location nearby. The Gob Squad takes half damage from the bombs.

tooltips.name: Rocket Blast
tooltips.Description: Fires a rocket at the target location. Upon colliding with any enemy units or buildings, the rocket will explode, dealing Magical damage in an AoE. Deals 0.25x damage to buildings

tooltips.name: Kamikaze
tooltips.Description: Charges for 4s, gaining bonus movespeed. When the duration ends, or the Gob Squad dies, they explode, losing a portion of their Health (based off their maximum Health), and dealing Magical base damage plus bonus damage based on the amount of Health they lost. They are stunned for 1s after use.

tooltips.name: Whoops
tooltips.Description: When Gob Squad dies, they immediately explode, dealing heavy Magical damage in a large area around them.

tooltips.name: Aerial Assault Mines
tooltips.Description: Tek targets an area. After targeting for all possible missiles, or not targeting for 4s, he fires the missiles from his pack into the stratosphere. After a small delay time, they land on a target area, and after another small delay, they explode, dealing large Magical damage.
tooltips.Note0: The missiles fire in succession initially in 0.3s intervals, with the interval reducing as more are fired.

tooltips.name: Megaton Blast
tooltips.Description: Tek engages the kinetic generators in his suit. After a charge time, Tek fires a blast of pure force at the target, dealing large damage and ministunning them. The charge time is not a channel.

tooltips.name: Mosquito Missiles
tooltips.description: Tek locks on to as many targets as possible, then unleashes a barrage of laser missiles that deal small damage.  Can target units multiple times.

tooltips.name: POWERED Mosquito Missiles
tooltips.description: Tek locks on to as many targets as possible, then unleashes a barrage of laser missiles that deal small damage.  Can target units multiple times.

tooltips.name: POWERED Shield
tooltips.description: Tek creates a shielding bubble that absorbs a percentage of damage he takes.

tooltips.name: POWERED Skycrack
tooltips.description: Tek unleashes a powerful beam of energy that cripples anyone caught in it, dealing large damage and slowing them.

tooltips.name: Last Resort
tooltips.description: Tek Powers Up once more, causing a huge explosion that deals massive damage to nearby enemies and himself.  He is stunned for 2 second after using this ability.

tooltips.name: Power Up
tooltips.description: Tek Powers Up to make his abilities much stronger.

tooltips.name: Shield
tooltips.description: Tek creates a shielding bubble that absorbs a percentage of damage he takes.

tooltips.name: Skycrack
tooltips.description: Tek unleashes a powerful beam of energy that cripples anyone caught in it, dealing large damage and slowing them.
tooltips.aghanim_description: Reduces cooldown and causes Skycrack to burn Mana equal to a percentage of its damage.

tooltips.name: Tesla Microarray
tooltips.Description: Deep within Tek's suit is a powerful electrical node. By redirecting his energies to it, he can cause it to release a blast of electrical coils that stun and damage nearby enemies. Deals double damage to enemies that are already stunned. Has a small charge up time.

tooltips.name: Chaos Wave
tooltips.description: Stops time in a large radius around Timekeeper.  Allies and enemies affected by this ability are invulnerable for the duration.  Casting Dilation on a target will remove the time stop effect immediately, but not apply any other effects.

tooltips.name: Chronoshift
tooltips.description: The Timekeeper knocks the worldline out of sync for a short time for a single unit.  When he reactivates the spell, the timeline resyncs after a short delay, returning the unit to the position, health and mana amounts they were at when this was cast.
tooltips.Note0: Sets health and Mana.
tooltips.Note1: After the delay this purges positive and negative buffs from all affected targets.
tooltips.Note2: Ignores units that are not or were not alive when the ability was cast.
tooltips.end_Description: Ends the Chronoshift, returning the affected unit back to where they were, with the same Health and Mana as they had when Chronoshift was cast.

tooltips.name: Chronoshift End
tooltips.Description: Ends the Chronoshift, returning the affected unit back to where they were, with the same Health and Mana as they had when Chronoshift was cast.

tooltips.name: Dilation
tooltips.description: Slows the targeted unit by shifting their position in the timeline. Their on-cooldown abilities will tick upwards instead of downwards.
tooltips.Note0: The slow affects turn rate, attack speed and movement speed.

tooltips.name: Echo
tooltips.description: Causes the target to echo recently taken damage, with a random chance.  The echoes diminish in strength as they continue.

tooltips.name: Echoes
tooltips.Description: Creates an area where Timekeeper may cast his targetable abilities on any units within it, regardless of the distance. All abilities cast this way have an instant cast time.

tooltips.name: Futurestrike
tooltips.description: After a random delay, deals Magical damage based on the length of the delay to the target enemy.
tooltips.Note0: The debuff cannot be purged.

tooltips.name: Haste Aura
tooltips.Description: Timekeeper hastens his nearby allies, causing them to gain movespeed and attack speed. When a spell is cast, there is a small chance its cooldown will be reduced. Can be actively used on an ally to guarantee their next Spell will have a reduced cooldown, with double the effective cooldown reduction. Halved effect on Ultimate abilities.

tooltips.name: Parallels
tooltips.description: The Timekeeper temporarily drags a parallel of himself from a different timeline into existence, restoring his health and mana to full.  His stats return to what they originally were after the effect ends.  If he would die while under the effects of this spell, his respawn time is reduced.

tooltips.name: Command Aura
tooltips.Description: Grants bonuses to nearby creeps.

tooltips.name: Demolisher
tooltips.Description: Deals large bonus damage to buildings when striking them

tooltips.name: Frenzy
tooltips.description: Upon dropping below 25%% health, the tower powers up its attacks, striking much faster and dealing 75 Magical splash damage for a short time.

tooltips.name: Disappearing Act
tooltips.description: The targeted ally or enemy is temporarily removed from the game, reappearing at a random nearby spot after the duration.  Instantly kills non-Hero units.
tooltips.Note0: A marker appears to show Trickster where the target will land.
tooltips.Note1: Grants a 200 radius of vision around the landing point.

tooltips.name: Encore
tooltips.description: The targeted unit becomes cursed, unable to cast any abilities or use any items except for the last one they used.

tooltips.name: Jam Magic
tooltips.description: Creates an aura near Trickster that silences enemies that stray too close.

tooltips.name: Surprise!
tooltips.description: Fires a bolt of energy that deals large Magical damage, stuns, and disarms the target.

tooltips.name: Berserker Aura
tooltips.Description: Grants bonus attack damage and attack speed to nearby allies based on their missing Health.
tooltips.Note0: The damage bonus lingers for 2s after leaving the aura radius.

tooltips.name: Bloodlust
tooltips.Description: Causes enemies in an area to gain bonus attack speed and attack damage, but have their movement speed slowed and take damage over time for a large duration. Each attack they make reduces the amount of time the debuff stays on them.

tooltips.name: Earthbreaker
tooltips.Description: War slams the ground with his axe, stunning nearby enemies and dealing Physical damage.

tooltips.name: FIGHT ME!
tooltips.Description: War goads his enemies into striking him. Each attack an affected enemy makes against War causes him to regain Health instead of losing it. At the end of the duration, he deals Pure damage equal to a portion of the combined attack damage of all enemies affected and his own attack damage. Bloodlust does not tick down for affected units. Affected enemies do not take damage from any source during the duration of this ability.
tooltips.Note0: Any damage dealt to War by the affected enemies recovers his Health, regardless of whether its source was an attack or not.
tooltips.Note1: If War dies, the effect ends early.

tooltips.name: Arcanite Shards
tooltips.Description:
Passive: Arcanite Induction

When a single instance of Magical damage from the user would exceed %minimum_dmg%, consumes a charge and deals %bonus_dmg% bonus Magical damage to the target.
tooltips.Lore: The volatile properties of Arcanite deter most sorcerors from its use, but for those who care not for a few lost limbs, it is a valuable ally.

tooltips.name: Black Rose
tooltips.description:
Active: Rending Darkness

After a %active_delay% second delay, the target enemy takes %damage% Pure damage, both the caster and the target are stunned for %active_duration% seconds and take %active_damage_increase%%% bonus damage from all sources while stunned. If either target is more than %max_distance% units away when the delay ends, nothing happens. Both the debuff and the stun cannot be purged.
tooltips.Note0: The debuff cannot be applied to the same target during the delay time or the stun duration.
tooltips.Note1: If either unit is not alive at the moment the delay time completes, the effect does not occur.
tooltips.lore: Its name refers not to the vibrant colour of the flower, but the accursed energies that swirl within.

tooltips.name: Crystal Focus
tooltips.Description:
Active: Prismancy

Grants a charge of Prismancy to the caster. Upon casting a non-Ultimate Spell, the charge is consumed, the Spell is refreshed, and you lose %mana_percentage%%% of your current Mana.
tooltips.lore: A crystalline flower, found growing in the tombs of powerful mages. It is said to increase the caster's ability to channel magical energy greatly, but its absorptive properties can render a mage's Mana pool rather empty after use.

tooltips.name: Deathscythe
tooltips.Description:
Passive: Soulclaimer

Attacks the wielder makes against Heroes purge buffs, slow by %slow%%% for %slow_duration% seconds, remove %percent_damage%%% of their current Health, and place this item on cooldown. The removal cannot be reduced, amplified or blocked.
tooltips.lore: Studied for eons, the Deathscythe's soul bending properties have perplexed even the most learned of scholars.

tooltips.name: Grim Gauntlet
tooltips.description:
Active (Heroes): Unleash

When targeting a Hero, consumes all stored charges to deal %damage% damage and slow them by %slow%%% per charge stored in the item. The slow duration increases as charges increase./n/n

Active (Creeps): Capture

Imprisons the soul of the target creep, devouring it soon after, restoring %health_perc%%% of the creep's current Health as Health and %mana_perc%%% as Mana. Adds a charge to the item. Maximum %maxcharge% charges.
tooltips.Note0: Deals 2/5ths of the damage in the first instance after a 0.75s delay, then the last 3 instances over 0.75s.
tooltips.Lore: It's a bit dark.

tooltips.name: Hephaestus' Hammer
tooltips.description:
Active: Guardian Wall

Surrounds all structures within %aura_radius% units with a protective wall of energy, reducing their incoming damage by %active_damage_reduction%%%, granting %active_regen_bonus% bonus Health regen, and causing enemies that attack those structures to be afflicted with a %active_move_slow%%% movement slow and %active_att_slow% attack slow for %active_slow_duration% seconds./n/n

Passive: Reinforce

Grants %aura_armor_bonus% Armor to nearby structures within a %aura_radius% radius.
tooltips.lore: Forged of a benevolent master, it glows dimly with a blue light. Its core, embedded in the hammer's hilt, threatens blinding, sunlike properties, but remains a calm yellow.

tooltips.name: Ironblood Potion
tooltips.Description:
Active: Drink

Grants %bonus_armor% Armor and %bonus_magic_resistance%%% Magic Resistance for %buff_duration% seconds.
tooltips.lore: An ancient goblin salve for wounds. Side effects may include: difficulty breathing, increased heartrate, magnetic eyebrows.

tooltips.name: Purging Powder
tooltips.Description:
Active: Purge

Purges the user's debuffs as a strong dispel. Does not purge stuns.
tooltips.lore: A rare commodity, the sparkling powder of the Nullstone removes all traces of magical energy from whatever it touches, quickly vanishing after its job is complete.

tooltips.name: Rage Potion
tooltips.Description:
Active: Drink

Grants %bonus_damage% bonus attack damage and %bonus_attack_speed% attack speed for %buff_duration% seconds.
tooltips.Lore: When the Goblin Army of Toothslicer approached the Tijadi's crackling abode, many fled. Some died. Those that drank this solution fought harder, but fell all the same.

tooltips.name: Seer's Lantern
tooltips.Description:
Active: Farsight

For %duration% seconds, in a %radius% radius, all enemies and allies become Ethereal, taking %magic_res_reduction%%% more Magical damage, slowing enemies by %slow%%%. Invisible enemies affected are revealed, and the slow is 4x stronger against them. The true sight lingers for a short time after the effect ends.

tooltips.name: Soul Vial
tooltips.description:
Passive: Soul Collection

Grants bonus damage for each charge, gaining a charge each time a unit is killed. Heroes grant 8 charges instead./n/n

Active: Consume

Devour the souls in the Vial to regain Health over time and bonus damage.
tooltips.lore: An ancient relic, first lauded by the Artificers for its swirling etheria, but quickly forbidden upon discovery of its macabre secrets.

tooltips.name: Wand of Yggdrasil
tooltips.description:
Active: Greater Drain

Drains %hp_drain% Health %hp_percent_drain%%% of the max Health %mp_drain% Mana, and %mp_percent_drain%%% of the max Mana, of the target enemy. After a %delay% second delay, you regain the amount drained as Health and Mana.
tooltips.Note0: The drain deals Pure damage, and is not blocked by Spell Immunity.
